reviewText: Based upon a best selling book by Fred Krup. This 42 minute documentary broadcast in 2009 provides a glimpse into many forms of renewable and sustainable energy sources. Different flavors of technologies to exploit solar, wind, wave, geothermal, and biomass engery sources. This program also promotes green energy technologies as an economic investment opportunity. This program would make an excellent addition to a school's science curiculum . This release only has the Earth: The Sequel program on it. There is an August 2014 release that includes the Earth: The Sequel documentary and two episodes from the Discovery Channel series Project Earth.
